entries.title: Ukraine aims for a peace summit by the end of February, foreign minister says
entries.description: Ukraine’s foreign minister said that his government is aiming to have a peace summit by the end of February, preferably at the United Nations.

entries.title: China will end Covid quarantine rule for incoming travelers
entries.description: China will stop requiring inbound travelers to go into quarantine beginning Jan. 8, the National Health Commission said on Monday in a major step toward easing

entries.title: Major aid groups suspend work in desperately poor Afghanistan after Taliban bar women
entries.description: Four major nternational aid groups suspended their operations in Afghanistan after a decision by the Taliban to ban women from working at the organizations.

entries.title: South Korea fires warning shots after North Korean drones cross border
entries.description: South Korea fired warning shots and launched jets after North Korea flew drones across the border. NBC's Ali Arouzi has details.

entries.title: South Korea launches jets and fires shots after North flies drone near capital
entries.description: South Korea’s military fired warning shots and scrambled fighter jets after North Korean drones violated its airspace for the first time in five years.

entries.title: At least 180 Rohingya feared dead after ‘unseaworthy’ boat goes missing
entries.description: At least 180 ethnic Rohingya stranded at sea for weeks after leaving Bangladesh in November are feared dead, the United Nations refugee agency said.

entries.title: 3 killed as Ukrainian drone shot near key base in Russia
entries.description: Russia said it had shot down a Ukrainian drone close to one of its air bases for bombers deep inside its own territory and that three Russians had been killed.

entries.title: China sends 71 warplanes and 7 ships toward Taiwan in 24 hours
entries.description: China’s military sent 71 planes and seven ships toward Taiwan after Beijing expressed anger at Taiwan-related provisions in a U.S. annual defense spending bill.

entries.title: Six dead, two injured after bus plunges into river in Spain
entries.description: Six people are dead and two injured after a passenger bus careened off a bridge and plunged into an overflowing river in Spain.
